description: An R Package for Benchmarking microRNA Array Data Normalization in the Context of Sample Classification.
name: PRECISION.array

metadata.abstract: Copyright Â© 2022 Huang, Wu, Yang and Qin.We present a new R package PRECISION.array for assessing the performance of data normalization methods in connection with methods for sample classification. It includes two microRNA microarray datasets for the same set of tumor samples: a re-sampling-based algorithm for simulating additional paired datasets under various designs of sample-to-array assignment and levels of signal-to-noise ratios and a collection of numerical and graphical agents for method performance assessment. The package allows users to specify their own methods for normalization and classification, in addition to implementing three methods for training data normalization, seven methods for test data normalization, seven methods for classifier training, and two methods for classifier validation. It enables an objective and systemic evaluation of the operating characteristics of normalization and classification methods in microRNA microarrays. To our knowledge, this is the first such agent available. The R package can be downloaded freely at https://github.com/LXQin/PRECISION.array.
metadata.title: PRECISION.array: An R Package for Benchmarking microRNA Array Data Normalization in the Context of Sample Classification
